main event: There are multiple reports of UFO sightings ranging from 1952 to 1957. These reports involve observations of unidentified aerial objects, including saucer-shaped and disc-like objects, as well as instances of objects hovering, appearing suddenly, and then disappearing from view.
interesting points: A Brazilian airliner was reportedly followed by a luminous UFO for approximately 15-20 minutes at a distance of about 300 meters.
A cigar-shaped object with a bright glow around the midsection was observed on radar.
An Air Force photographer captured photographs of a disc-shaped object hovering above the ground, which were determined to be genuine by an expert.
There were reports of an object resembling a kettle drum, which was luminous and observed crossing the sky at a rapid speed.
The reports contain detailed questionnaires to gather information from witnesses, including estimations of speed and distance of the observed objects.
location: Dayton, Ohio and various other locations
witnesses: credible witnesses such as military personnel and civilians
photographs: yes, the report includes photographs in some cases
